Croatia and Albania face off on June 19th, 2024 at the Düsseldorf Arena in Group B of the 2024 UEFA Euro Championship.
Croatia’s hopes of making it to the knockout phase are hampered by their goal differential absorbing a -3 setback in the opening game.
Albania cannot afford to lose again as it would almost certainly mean elimination.
Albania might be in position for an improbable run to the group stage if they upset Croatia.
Croatia has only lost 3 games of their last 10.
Nedim Bajrami, who scored the fastest goal in European Championship history, is expected to start.
Albania loses their cool in games when they trail, but Croatia’s poor goal scoring record will allow them to play the style they want.
Sylvinho is considering making changes to the XI that lined up against Italy.
Jasir Asani has recovered from an ankle injury and may start.
Rey Manaj is vying for promotion from the bench after Armando Broja's lackluster performance against Italy.

Croatia's squad for the 2024 UEFA Euro includes goalkeepers Dominik Livakovic, Nediljko Labrovic, Dominik Kotarski, and Ivica Ivusic; defenders Josip Juranovic, Marin Pongracic, Martin Erlic, Duje Caleta-Car, Josip Stanisic, Domagoj Vida, Borna Sosa, and Josko Gvardiol; midfielders Mario Pasalic, Marco Pasalic, Luka Ivanusec, Nikola Vlasic, Marcelo Brozovic, Lovro Majer, Luka Modric, and Mateo Kovacic; forwards Marko Pjaca, Bruno Petkovic, and Andrej Kramaric.

Albania's squad for the 2024 UEFA Euro Championship includes goalkeepers Alen Sherri, Etrit Berisha, Elhan Kastrati, and Thomas Strakosha; defenders Enea Mihaj, Elseid Hysaj, Jon Mersinaj, Frédéric Veseli, Marash Kumbulla, Mario Mitaj, Naser Aliji, Iván Balliu, and Berat Djimsiti; midfielders Nedim Bajrami, Keidi Bare, Ylber Ramadani, Kristjan Asllani, and Qazim Laçi; forwards Armando Broja, Arbër Hoxha, Ernest Muçi, Taulant Seferi, Sokol Çikalleshi, Myrto Uzuni, Jasir Asani, Rey Manaj, and Arbnor Muçolli.
The match will be broadcast live on TV and available on streaming platforms such as Fubo, Vidgo, Sling TV, Peacock TV, and YouTube TV.
When Albania plays patiently till the very end, they are a more formidable squad.
The match can also be followed live with commentary in English on MARCA in English, starting two hours before the match.
Arber Hoxha, who plays for Dinamo Zagreb, could be called upon.
Ernest Muci is another contender for the lineup.
